pcanvas.draw
Enum Colors

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Enum<Colors>
      pcanvas.draw.Colors
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Colors>
public enum Colors
extends java.lang.Enum<Colors>

An enumerated type which will convert a given hex value into something usable by the PApplet fill, stroke and other related functions.
